page.title: 06The Railway - Inverkeithing
page.content:
The railway station in{Inverkeithing} is situated in the north of the town. It is well served as it is on the mainline north from the{Forth Rail {Bridge}and trains going to{ {Aberdeen,Inverness,Edinburgh and {London}stop at the station.
On platform 2 (northbound trains) new staion buildings are under construction and are due for completion in the Autumn of{1985.}
In addition to the BR commuter and Inter City services there is also a train which takes employees to{Rosyth {Dockyard}daily. At Inverkeithing East Junction there is a railway workshop.
The station always has many{taxis}in attendance serving the sailors from {Rosyth naval base.
